the_missing_artifact.name: The Missing Artifact
the_missing_artifact.description: A valuable artifact has been stolen from the village elder. Find it and return it for a reward.

objectives.description: Return the artifact to the Village Elder.

the_goblin_threat.name: The Goblin Threat
the_goblin_threat.description: Goblins are becoming bolder. Clear the Goblin Cave of their leader.

objectives.description: Defeat the Goblin King in the Goblin Leader's Chamber.

elder_quest_start.speaker: Village Elder
lines: Oh, traveler, I beg of you!
A terrible thief has stolen our village's most sacred artifact!
Please, you must help us! Find the ancient_artifact and bring it back.

elder_thankful.speaker: Village Elder
lines: Thank you, brave soul! The spirits of our ancestors bless your journey.
Be swift, the artifact must be recovered!

elder_disappointed.speaker: Village Elder
lines: Alas, I understand. Perhaps another will rise to the challenge.

elder_quest_complete.speaker: Village Elder
lines: You have returned the artifact! Our village is safe once more!
Here is your reward, and our eternal gratitude.

guard_goblin_threat.speaker: Guard Captain
lines: The goblins have been growing bolder. They've even started raiding farms!
Their leader, the so-called Goblin King, must be dealt with.
Will you venture into the Goblin Cave and eliminate him?

guard_encouraged.speaker: Guard Captain
lines: Good! The road to the Goblin Cave is east of the Forest Edge. Be careful.

artifact_found_event.trigger_message: A faint glow emanates from the artifact in your hand.

player_enters_ancient_shrine.description: The air thickens with ancient magic.

effect.message: You feel an old presence watching you.

treasure_chest_opened.description: You successfully opened the treasure chest!
treasure_chest_opened.trigger_message: The chest opens with a creak, revealing its contents.

lore.ancient_shrine_inscription: Here lies the wisdom of the ancients, etched into stone for those worthy enough to seek it.
lore.goblin_history_scroll: A tattered scroll detailing the short, violent history of the forest goblins. They revere a 'Blood-Tooth Shaman'.

journal_entries.artifact_found: Found the Ancient Artifact. I should return it to the Elder.
journal_entries.goblin_king_defeated: The Goblin King has fallen. The village should be safer now.
